name: colorflow-infinity-pi
description: ColorFlow Infinity - A color-matching puzzle game powered by Pi Network

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp index.html public/ && cp -r js public/ && mkdir -p public/assets/sounds public/assets/images && touch public/assets/sounds/click.mp3 public/assets/sounds/connect.mp3 public/assets/sounds/levelup.mp3 public/assets/sounds/powerup.mp3 public/assets/sounds/achievement.mp3 public/assets/sounds/intro.mp3 public/assets/sounds/background.mp3 public/assets/sounds/fail.mp3 public/assets/images/studio-intro.mp4 && echo 'Build completed successfully!'
scripts.build:simple: mkdir -p assets/sounds assets/images && touch assets/sounds/click.mp3 assets/sounds/connect.mp3 assets/sounds/levelup.mp3 assets/sounds/powerup.mp3 assets/sounds/achievement.mp3 assets/sounds/intro.mp3 assets/sounds/background.mp3 assets/sounds/fail.mp3 assets/images/studio-intro.mp4 && echo 'Simple build completed!'
